text: Joe Toleman (26 September 1921 – 15 May 2009) was an Australian rules footballer who played with Collingwood in the Victorian Football League (VFL). == Notes == == External links == * *Profile on Collingwood Forever Category:1921 births Category:2009 deaths Category:Australian rules footballers from Victoria (Australia) Category:Collingwood Football Club players Category:Ivanhoe Amateurs Football Club players Category:Hamilton Football Club players
title: Joe Toleman
